title: Gifted Galaxy Shyvana to my friend but he never got it.
body: So I just bought my friend a Galaxy Shyvana skin and it took the Rp out of my account but he never got the skin. Is there anything that can be done about this? I spent like 20 dollars lol

replies.body:
Hey ZenaKouu,

I'm sorry to hear that, I like gifting my friends as well and I fully expect them to have the content I send them. As far as I can tell, you did gift someone and it went through successfully. Since it's an account-level issue, we want to look into the account with your friend and see why the content isn't available. Please have your friend contact my colleagues through the Support Site so we can get to the bottom of it: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new
